    • Restock

      public static ArrayList<Restock> Restock(Revs revs) throws SQLException
      Generates a list of inventory items that currently need to be restocked based on the on-hand/threshold amount specified in the database for each inventory item
      Parameters:
      revs - database connection
      Returns:
      ArrayList - all inventory items that are currently below their respective restock threshold
      Throws:
      SQLException
